name: Noodle Wars
description:
I've created this game for the Weekly Game Jam 156 with the theme "Noodle", and to be honest I'm not satisfied with the way it looked, this is my first time trying something other than platformer games, and I've decided to create a card game to try it out. Card games turned out hard to make especially the AI part and I completely enjoyed that.  I kept going through the idea just because I wanted to get better at creating UI elements. I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed coding it, and as always please give as much feedback as possible so I can improve more and more.

Huge thanks to John Haddad for always creating the best soundtracks :).

I had to research about the differences between Pasta and Noodles before creating this game so don't even at me! I tried my best!

How to play:

-You get 2 moves on the first round, then each other round you get 1

-Once you start your round, You can either place a card on the battlefield from your draft or you can attack the player with a card on the battlefield

-Keep in mind your flour rate, if it drops below 14 which is the minimum flour needed to make a noodle type you will lose.

-Meatballs are power ups that you can use to add 1 damage to one of the noodles on the battlefield that you own.
